title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water until al dente.
Whisk eggs and parmesan together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with bacon and egg-cheese mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spice mix for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until golden brown.
Fry onions until soft, then add tomato puree and simmer.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken.
Simmer for 10 minutes and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
